de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers
Class Marker

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.Marker
Direct Known Subclasses:
BalloonMarker, SpotMarker, StickMarker
public abstract class Marker
extends Object

A Marker is a graphical queue that is drawn on top of a Trackable in order to highlight it in the simulator. The classes that extend Marker provide different graphical styles.

Author:
Miquel Martin
